item.title: The 'Akempali Tribe
item.description: Overview The ‘Akempali1 tribe was the second group to diverge from the Moráillona family. They were spearheaded by the queen Nghoyúri2, who had helped Gesímhurën3 before.

item.title: The Morellic Tribe
item.description: Overview The Morellic tribe, known as Moréillų1, was the continuation of the Moráillona family after it grew and became larger following the destruction of the Oyhóyunol tribe.

item.title: The Ováurmith Tribe
item.description: Overview The Ováurmith1 tribe began as a group of Moráillona minikin who had interbred with the Ilorrų́nolith following the southern migration.

item.title: The Sníssol Tribe
item.description: Overview The Snissol[^1] tribe was the continuation of the 1st Century BD Sëniksol tribe. Reputation Relationships ‘Akempali Morellic Ǫzí Ováurmith Migration Culture

item.title: The Ǫzí Tribe
item.description: Overview The Ǫzí1 tribe was the result of intermingling and interbreeding of Oyhóyunol nobles on a fruitless diplomatic campaign with the Rwaránehru tribe.
